include-in-header.text:
<style>
#title-block-header { display: none; }
.guide-card {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
  border-radius: 20px;
  padding: 2.5rem;
  margin-bottom: 2.5rem;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: auto 1fr auto;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 2rem;
  box-shadow: 0 20px 60px -15px rgba(102, 126, 234, 0.5);
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}
.guide-card::before {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  top: -50%;
  right: -20%;
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
  border-radius: 50%;
}
.guide-card::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -30%;
  left: 10%;
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05);
  border-radius: 50%;
}
.guide-icon-wrap {
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  border-radius: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 2.5rem;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}
.guide-info {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  background: transparent !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  border: none !important;
}
.guide-info h2 {
  color: white;
  margin: 0 0 0.5rem 0;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
}
.guide-info p {
  color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  line-height: 1.6;
  max-width: 500px;
}
.guide-btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 0.5rem;
  background: white;
  color: #667eea !important;
  padding: 1rem 2rem;
  border-radius: 12px;
  font-weight: 700;
  font-size: 1rem;
  text-decoration: none !important;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}
.guide-btn:hover {
  transform: translateY(-3px) scale(1.02);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .guide-card {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
    grid-template-columns: unset !important;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin-top:20%!important;
  }
  .guide-card > * {
    flex-shrink: 0 !important;
  }
  .guide-icon-wrap {
    margin: 0 auto;
    width: 60px;
    height: 60px;
    font-size: 2rem;
    order: 1;
  }
  .guide-info,
  .guide-card section.guide-info,
  .guide-card .level2.guide-info {
    width: 100% !important;
    display: block !important;
    order: 2;
    background: transparent !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
    border: none !important;
    padding: 0 !important;
    margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .guide-info h2,
  .guide-card section.guide-info h2,
  .guide-card .guide-info .anchored {
    font-size: 1.4rem;
    display: block !important;
  }
  .guide-info p {
    max-width: 100%;
    font-size: 1rem;
    display: block !important;
  }
  .guide-card > p:last-child,
  .guide-btn {
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem;
    order: 3;
  }
}
</style>
